home.title: Software Portfolio
home.description: I'm a software developer specializing in building modern web applications with Vue, React, Nuxt.js, and Next.js. I have a passion for creating beautiful, responsive user interfaces with clean code.

hero.title: Nice to meet you, I'm
hero.description: I'm a student at BYU-I getting a Bachelors in Software Development. I love using technology to solve problems. I don't just write code; I take initiative, learn fast, and chase down solutions until they stick.

list.title: Handcrafted Haven
list.description: A web application connecting artisans with customers who appreciate handmade products. It serves as a digital marketplace, fostering community, supporting local artisans, and promoting sustainable consumption.

list.title: Family Recipe Vault
list.description: The Family Recipe Vault is a secure and collaborative digital platform designed to preserve, organize, and share family recipes. This project aims to address the challenge of maintaining family culinary traditions by providing a centralized space for recipe storage, historical context, and collaboration among family members.

list.title: FileX
list.description: FileX is a sleek file-sharing application with built-in error notifications. It allows users to upload, download, and manage files effortlessly while ensuring a seamless user experience with real-time feedback and modern UI animations.

list.title: Task Manager Todo List
list.description: A task management application built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Prisma. Users can add, edit, and manage tasks in place using an intuitive UI.

list.title: Real-Time Chat App
list.description: A modern, real-time chat application with infinite scroll, multi-user conversations, edit and delete functionality, hover menus, global state, and data persistence.

list.title: Sudoku Solver
list.description: Sudoku Solver using Erlang. This solver checks if a Sudoku puzzle is valid and solves it using a backtracking recursive algorithm. It also provides a web interface built with Next.js and React. Both the backend and frontend are containerized using Docker, allowing for easy deployment and scalability.

list.title: Vocab Extractor Extension
list.description: A tool for extracting vocabulary from Duolingo words practice in a JSON format for personal use or with my flashcards site. (Available in the Chrome Web Store)

list.title: Flashcards site
list.description: A web application for uploading, studying, and managing flashcards. Built with Nuxt.js, Vue, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, it offers a user-friendly interface with smooth animations and seamless performance. It is designed for desktop and touch devices, ensuring a responsive experience.

list.title: QR Code Generator
list.description: A simple QR code generator built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to create QR codes for URLs, text, wifi, and contacts. You can customize the colors and download the generated QR code as a PNG image.
